Acts of great and intense love spawn love siktemporas, kindly creatures bearing intense strength that start and end wars in the name of the love that birthed them. These adept combatants form crossbows and bolts out of their emotional bonds, though they typically fight only to protect that which they love. While unable to speak given their featureless faces, they're nevertheless compassionate listeners and savvy communicators. Each love siktempora takes the form of two small humanoids conjoined at the hip with three legs, two arms, and two heads. Their faces are completely featureless except for a faint, ever present blush spread across their cheeks, and they always appear garbed in stylish garments from obscure civilizations. **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Love Siktempora](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1296) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 233 **Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 500 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Dimension of Time Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +26, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +33 **Str** +4 **Dex** +9 **Con** +5 **Int** +4 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +9 **Telepathic Singer** A love siktempora can provide verbal components and auditory performances for their [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=31) spells even though they can't speak. They do so without needing to make noise, as all creatures within range of their telepathy hear the components in their mind. However, the siktempora can do so only as long as at least one other creature with an Intelligence modifier of +0 or higher is within the range of their telepathy.
**Temporal Sense** A siktempora can always roll Dimension of Time Lore for initiative. When it does, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll. --- **AC** 38 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +31 **Will** +28 **HP** 210 , regeneration 50 (deactivated by evil, mental, or [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378)) **Immunities** [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) **Deflect Aggression** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** The love siktempora is targeted by an attack; **Effect** The siktempora glows with compassion, deflecting the attacker's aggression. The siktempora gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC and resistance 15 against the triggering attack, and the attacker must attempt a saving throw against the siktempora's heartsong (see below).
**Uncanny Pounce** **Trigger** The love siktempora rolls Dimension of Time Lore for initiative; **Effect** The love siktempora Strides once and makes a claw Strike, in either order. --- **Speed** 50 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Ranged** emotional bolt +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d10+10 piercing plus 1d10 mental and heartsong **Occult Innate Spells** DC 37 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **8th** [Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27) - **Constant (8th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Bard Composition Spells** DC 37, 3 Focus Points - **Cantrips (8th)** [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Inspire Defense](/Spells.aspx?ID=387) - **8th** [Lingering Composition](/Spells.aspx?ID=389) **Heartsong** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A creature that takes mental damage from the love siktempora's emotional bolt must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) by the siktempora until the end of the target's next turn. [Hostile actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) don't end this fascinated condition. **Love's Impunity** The love siktempora's emotional bolt Strike doesn't trigger reactions that normally trigger based off making a ranged attack. **Telepathic Ballad** (emotion, enchantment, mental, occult) The love siktempora casts [_inspire courage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=386) or [inspire defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=188). It increases the area to a 200-foot emanation and increases the status bonuses the cantrip provides to +2.
